actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 907 of title 37, United States Code, relating to pay and allowances of enlisted members of the uniformed services who are appointed officers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the pay and allowance structure of enlisted members of the uniformed services who are appointed as officers.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 907 of title 37, United States Code, relating to pay and allowances of enlisted members of the uniformed services who are appointed officers, and for other purposes.
